info.label: description
info.text: Bosch PRO360 a worldwide inventory management application for power tools, includes several web and mobile apps.

info.label: description
info.text: Accessibility checker for websites owned by Futurice. The tool is based on the W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Not publicly available yet.

info.label: description
info.text: Futurice owned internal app developed for Human Care department to prevent spread COVID by notifying office people in case of positive cases. Not publicly available.

info.label: description
info.text: Scroll Versions is the engine that powers great documentation. It takes management, authoring, and publishing in Confluence to new levels of ease and flexibility. The work on the project included moving code towards new technologies, bugfix, refactoring, writing tests, and developing new features with a focus on usability.

info.label: description
info.text: Scroll Translations helps you manage and deliver your Confluence content to a global audience. Manage multiple languages of your documentation in a single space. The work on the project included moving code towards new technologies, bugfix, refactoring, writing tests and developing new features with a focus on usability.

info.label: description
info.text: With Scroll Viewport for Confluence, your team can collaborate on documentation in Confluence then display it online as a help center. Users can find the help they need with site-wide search and a layout designed with content fundability in mind.

info.label: description
info.text: Development of custom Jira and Confluence apps for medium and large size companies.

info.label: description
info.text: Southwestern is a place and time of personal growth and joint endeavor. The main goals of the partnership with Handsome were to do not just a re-branding and a re-design of the website, but also to create a set of reusable UI components for the future usage.

info.label: description
info.text: The project was focused on studying Vanilla JavaScript, on the implementation of complex animations using standard tools and setting up the project infrastructure from scratch.

info.label: description
info.text: Company.com is a trusted provider of enterprise quality operational resources to help start, run and grow your business. The main goals of the partnership with Handsome were to re-design their dashboard and marketing website.

info.label: description
info.text: Knowledge base for employees at Handsome with the support of different devices (mobile phones, tablets, desktop). Not publicly available.
